culprit.name: Maya Pillai
culprit.profile: The victim's seemingly loyal and underpaid personal chef.

victim.name: Anand Menon
victim.profile: A wealthy, retired NRI businessman who collects rare historical artifacts.

crime.object: A set of antique Travancore-era gold coins.
crime.description: Theft of a specific, high-value collection.

motive.description: The culprit, Maya, is not a greedy thief. Her family in the village is about to lose their ancestral land due to a predatory loan. Stealing the coins is her desperate, last-resort attempt to save her family's home and honor.
